mutants.code:
def binToDecimal(num):
    base = 2
    dec_val = 0
    temp = num
    while temp:
        last_digit = temp % 10
        temp = int(temp / 10)
        dec_val += last_digit * base
        base = base * 2
    return dec_val

def binToDecimal(num):

    dec_val = 0
    temp = num
    while temp:
        last_digit = temp % 10
        temp = int(temp / 10)
        dec_val += last_digit * base
        base = base * 2
    return dec_val
